column4: Hi - I'm running Ubuntu 9.1 and I want to disable the startup sound. I've looked in System-Settings-Sound but the only option here is to turn of ALL sound, or change themes. I've looked in the System-administration-login, but nothing there either. how do I turn i of?
there's probably something called Gnome Login Sound in the Startup Applications.
Found it - will give it a try. Thanks
